title: Boost your productivity with Microsoft Office, now 20% off at just $31.99
content:
Macworld

Whether you’re a student, a professional, or even a small business owner, you need the right tools to streamline your work processes and reach your optimal results. With Microsoft Office, that level of control and execution is definitely within your grasp.

Secure a lifetime license now for Microsoft Office Professional Plus 2019 for Windows or Microsoft Office Home and Business 2019 for Mac at an exclusive price of $31.99. This one-time purchase grants access to the full suite of Office apps for life, a deal unmatched by the monthly subscription of Microsoft Office 365 priced at $70 per year.

Windows users will enjoy Office Professional Plus 2019, equipped with Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, OneNote, Publisher, and Access. Mac users will receive Home and Business 2019, featuring the same apps except Publisher and Access, with the addition of Teams.

With Home and Business 2019, you can create professional documents, spreadsheets, and presentations with ease, thanks to its user-friendly interface and advanced features. The software ensures compatibility with various file formats, making it easy to collaborate with others seamlessly. Moreover, the Business edition includes Outlook, a powerful tool for organizing your emails, calendars, and contacts efficiently.

Don’t miss this opportunity to get either Microsoft Office Home and Business 2019 for Mac or Microsoft Office Professional Plus 2019 for Windows. at an unbeatable price of $31.99, saving nearly $200 from the regular price. 

Make sure to get your extra 20% off by using the codeword ENJOY20 when you make your purchase before 11:59 p.m. PT on April 16.

 

Microsoft Office Professional Plus 2019 for Windows – $31.99
